<div id=\"roto-our-services\" class=\"roto-home-container hide-mobile\"> <div id=\"dsk-services-upper\"> <div class=\"custom-row\" style=\"background-position: center top\"> <div class=\"main-service-col\"> <h1 class=\"tk-din\"><a data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"service-title\" data-galabel=\"Residential-Plumbing\" href=\"/residential/\">Residential Plumbing</a></h1> <p class=\"service-text\">Our experts are ready 24/7 to take on plumbing issues big and small, from dripping faucets and pipe leaks, to sewer &amp; drain cleaning and water heater replacement. We also offer specialty services to tackle complex emergency repairs.</p> <a class=\"read-more\" data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"read-more\" data-galabel=\"Residential-Plumbing\" href=\"/residential/\">READ MORE<em class=\"tk-material-icons\"></em></a> </div> <div class=\"tech\"> <img src=\"/contentAsset/image/e8c587f5-6cf0-4b37-a23b-02dfc8bf9d80/fileAsset/\" alt=\"Roto-Rooter Technician\"> </div> <div class=\"main-service-col pull-right\"> <h2 class=\"tk-din\"><a data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"service-title\" data-galabel=\"Commercial-Plumbing\" href=\"/commercial/\">Commercial Plumbing</a></h2> <p class=\"service-text\">Roto-Rooter offers full-service commercial plumbing and drain cleaning services to both large and small businesses. No other company is trusted or recommended more than Roto-Rooter for plumbing maintenance and emergency service.</p> <a class=\"read-more\" data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"read-more\" data-galabel=\"Commercial-Plumbing\" href=\"/commercial/\">READ MORE<em class=\"tk-material-icons\"></em></a> </div> <div class=\"services-row\"> <h2 class=\"service-col service-title tk-din\"><a data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"service-title\" data-galabel=\"Plumbing-Drains\" href=\"/residential/\" title=\"Plumbing &amp; Drains\" style=\"width:6.25rem\">Plumbing &amp; Drains</a></h2> <h2 class=\"service-col service-title tk-din\"><a data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"service-title\" data-galabel=\"Water-Heater\" href=\"/residential/water-heater/\" title=\"Water Heaters\" style=\"width:6.25rem\">Water Heaters</a></h2> <h2 class=\"service-col service-title tk-din\"><a data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"service-title\" data-galabel=\"Water-Damage-Restoration\" href=\"/water-damage-restoration/\" title=\"Water Damage Restoration\" style=\"width:10rem\">Water Damage Restoration</a></h2> <h2 class=\"service-col service-title tk-din\"><a data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"service-title\" data-galabel=\"Emergency-Service\" href=\"/residential/emergency-plumber/\" title=\"Emergency Service\" style=\"width:9.375rem\">Emergency Service</a></h2> </div> </div> </div> <div id=\"dsk-services-bottom\"> <div class=\"custom-row\"> <div class=\"service-col service-text\"> <span>Roto-Rooter makes thousands of plumbing repairs every day, and our team of professionals clean and repair more sewers and drains than any other company in North America.</span> <a class=\"read-more\" data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"read-more\" data-galabel=\"Plumbing-Drains\" href=\"/residential/\">READ MORE<em class=\"tk-material-icons\"></em></a> </div> <div class=\"service-col service-text\"> <span>Trust Roto-Rooter for water heater repair and replacement of gas, electric and tankless water heaters. Our experts will ensure you have hot water fast!</span> <a class=\"read-more\" data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"read-more\" data-galabel=\"Water-Heater\" href=\"/residential/water-heater/\">READ MORE<em class=\"tk-material-icons\"></em></a> </div> <div class=\"service-col service-text\"> <span>Roto-Rooter technicians have Institute of Inspection, Cleaning and Restoration Certification (IICRC) and are equipped with state-of-the-art water extraction, cleanup, drying and moisture testing equipment.</span> <a class=\"read-more\" data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"read-more\" data-galabel=\"Water-Damage-Restoration\" href=\"/water-damage-restoration/\">READ MORE<em class=\"tk-material-icons\"></em></a> </div> <div class=\"service-col service-text\"> <span>Our plumbers are ready to go 24/7 for emergencies - including nights, weekends and holidays.</span> <a class=\"read-more\" data-gacategory=\"Services\" data-gaaction=\"read-more\" data-galabel=\"Emergency-Service\" href=\"/residential/emergency-plumber/\">READ MORE<em class=\"tk-material-icons\"></em></a> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class=\"roto-home-container\"> <div class=\"custom-row widget-container\"> <div class=\"left-side-container\"> <div id=\"roto-home-wcrr\"> <h2 class=\"tk-din title\">Why Choose Roto-Rooter?</h2> <ul id=\"home-wcrr-list\"> <div class=\"tab-row\"> <li data-gacategory=\"why-choose-rr\" data-gaaction=\"click\" data-galabel=\"Emergency Service\"> <a href=\"tel:18007686911\" class=\"valign-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg\">Emergency Service</a> <span class=\"valign-center hidden-xs\">Emergency Service</span> <span class=\"bp-desc tk-sans hidden-xs \">When youre facing an emergency, you want a fast, professional plumber and nobody gets there faster or does it better than Roto-Rooter.</span> </li> <li data-gacategory=\"why-choose-rr\" data-gaaction=\"click\" data-galabel=\"Available 24/7\"><span class=\"valign-center\">Available 24/7</span> <span class=\"bp-desc tk-sans hidden-xs\">Because plumbing problems can strike when you least expect them, our friendly and knowledgeable team works around the clock, tackling jobs big and small.</span> </li> </div> <div class=\"tab-row\"> <li data-gacategory=\"why-choose-rr\" data-gaaction=\"click\" data-galabel=\"Licensed &amp; Insured\"> <span class=\"valign-center\">Licensed &amp; Insured</span> <span class=\"bp-desc tk-sans hidden-xs\">Roto-Rooter plumbers are licensed and insured. We follow applicable plumbing codes and our technicians arrive in branded Roto-Rooter vehicles.</span> </li> <li data-gacategory=\"why-choose-rr\" data-gaaction=\"click\" data-galabel=\"Well Known Reputation\"> <span class=\"valign-center\">Well Known Reputation</span> <span class=\"bp-desc tk-sans hidden-xs\">Roto-Rooter offers unmatched plumbing services backed by an 80+ year reputation for quality.</span> </li> </div> <div class=\"tab-row\"> <li data-gacategory=\"why-choose-rr\" data-gaaction=\"click\" data-galabel=\"Trusted &amp; Recommended Since 1935\"> <span class=\"valign-center\">Trusted &amp; Recommended Since 1935</span> <span class=\"bp-desc tk-sans hidden-xs\">We're North America's largest provider of plumbing repair services and sewer &amp; drain cleaning services. Millions of homeowners and businesses in all 50 states and across Canada rely on Roto-Rooter plumbers every year.</span> </li> </div> </ul> </div> <div id=\"youtube-widget\"> <div class=\"youtube-widget-container\" style=\"background-image: url('https://img.youtube.com/vi/6eISgCHCLGc/0.jpg'); \" itemprop=\"video\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/VideoObject\"> <iframe id=\"rrvideo\" class=\"embeded-youtube\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"1\" title=\"YouTube video player\" width=\"100%\" height=\"100%\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6eISgCHCLGc?enablejsapi=1&amp;rel=0&amp;origin=https:%2F%2Fwww.rotorooter.com\">Youtube Video</iframe> <div class=\"overlay\"> <a href=\"#youtube-widget\" class=\"play\" data-gacategory=\"Video\" data-gaaction=\"click-button\" data-galabel=\"Play-Video\"><span class=\"hidden\">Play</span></a> <div class=\"overlay-title\">How to Retrieve Items From a Drain</div> <a class=\"moreVideo\" data-gacategory=\"Video\" data-gaaction=\"more-videos\" data-galabel=\"More-Plumbing-Videos\" href=\"/plumbing-videos/\">More Plumbing Videos<i class=\"material-icons\"></i></a> </div> <meta itemprop=\"name\" content=\"How to Retrieve Items From a Drain\"> <meta itemprop=\"description\" content=\"It's a helpless feeling whenever jewelry or other important items fall into a sink drain. possible before, and homeowners can realize a number of advantages from this method. Here are a few of the benefits you can yield by going with trenchless pipe repair: 1. function(app, ev, json) {\n                    lpTag.defer(function() {\n                        lpTag.events.trigger(app, ev, json);\n                    }, 1);\n                }\n            },\n            defer: function(fn, fnType) {\n                if (fnType == 0) {\n                    this._defB = this._defB || [];\n                    this._defB.push(fn);\n                } else if (fnType == 1) {\n                    this._defT = this._defT || [];\n                    this._defT.push(fn);\n                } else {\n                    this._defL = this._defL || [];\n this.protocol + '//' + ((this.ovr && this.ovr.domain) ? this.ovr.domain : 'lptag.liveperson.net') + '/' + 'tag' + '/' + 'tag.js' + '?' + 'site=' + this.site;\n                }\n                var s = document.createElement('script');\n                s.setAttribute('charset', chr ? chr : 'UTF-8');\n                if (id) {\n                    s.setAttribute('id', id);\n                }\n                s.setAttribute('src', url);\n                document.getElementsByTagName('head').item(0).appendChild(s);\n            },\n            init: function() {\n                this._timing = function() {\n                        that._domReady('domReady');\n                    }, false);\n                }\n                if (typeof(window._lptStop) == 'undefined') {\n                    this.load();\n                }\n            },\n            start: function() {\n                this.autoStart = true;\n            },\n            _domReady: function(n) {\n                if (!this.isDom) {\n                    this.isDom = true;\n                    this.events.trigger('LPT', 'DOM_READY', {\n                        t: n\n                    });\n                }\n                this._timing[n] = (new Date()).getTime();\n            },\n            vars: lpTag.vars || [],\n            dbs: lpTag.dbs || [],\n            ctn: lpTag.ctn || [],\n            sdes: lpTag.sdes || [],\n            ev: lpTag.ev || [],\n\n            addServiceStatus: function(serviceId, topic, status) {\n                            },\n\n            bindEvents: function() {\n                console.log(\"Binding Events ...\");\n                var counter = 0;\n                var postChat = false;\n                this.events.bind(\"lpUnifiedWindow\", \"state\", function(eventData, eventInfo) {\n                    console.log(\"Data: \", eventData);\n                    //console.log(\"Info: \",eventInfo);\n\n                    // If a chat is started reset variables on page\n                    if(eventData.state === \"init\") {\n                        console.log(\"reset counter\");\n                        counter = 0;\n                        postChat = false;\n                        console.log(\"Set cursor:pointer on lp_close\");\n                        $(\".lp_close\").css(\"cursor\", \"pointer\");\n                    }\n                    // If post chat survey is shown, flag to not close the window\n                    if(eventData.state === \"postChat\") {\n                        console.log(1);\n                        postChat = true;\n                    }\n                    // else check to see if post chat is completed, or if the chat has ended\n                    else {\n                        // if the post chat is completed then close chat window\n                        if (eventData.state === \"applicationEnded\") {\n                            $('.lp_close').trigger(\"click\");\n                            console.log(234);\n                        }\n                        // else see if chat has ended\n                        else {\n                            // if chat has ended, increase the counter and run the check for post chat survey\n                            if (eventData.state === \"ended\") {\n                                counter++;\n                                // only run this function once\n                                if (counter == 1) {\n                                    console.log(2);\n                                    setTimeout(function() {\n                                         console.log(3);\n                                        // if there is no flag for post chat survey, close the window\n                                        if(postChat == false){\n                                            $('.lp_close').trigger(\"click\");\n                                            console.log(4);\n                                        }\n                                        //lp_cancel_button\n                                        $('.lp_cancel_button').click(function() {\n                                            $('.lp_close').trigger(\"click\");\n                                        });\n                                    }, 500);\n                                }\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n                });\n            }\n        };\n        lpTag.bindEvents();\n        lpTag.init();\n    } else {\n        window.lpTag._tagCount += 1;\n {\n\t\t\t\tbackground-image: url('/images/HOME-talent-DSK.png');\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n</style> <div id=\"career-promo-widget\"> <h3 class=\"tk-din career-header\"> Join the Roto-Rooter Team! <a href=\"/careers/\" class=\"tk-sans\" data-gacategory=\"Recruitment\" data-gaaction=\"click-link\" data-galabel=\"Available-Career-Opportunities\">Explore available career opportunities<i class=\"material-icons\"></i></a> </h3> <div class=\"career-body\"> <div class=\"career-tabs-head\"> <p>What's it like to work with Roto-Rooter? Hear what our plumbers have to say.</p> <div class=\"career-tabs\"> <a id=\"careerTab1\" data-gacategory=\"Recruitment\" data-gaaction=\"click-button\"
